CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( clcommon__Contact__c ) , IF( ISBLANK( clcommon__Account__c ) , IF( ISBLANK( clcommon__User__c ) , '', clcommon__User__r.FirstName + ' ' + clcommon__User__r.LastName) , clcommon__Account__r.Name ) , clcommon__Contact__r.FirstName + ' ' + clcommon__Contact__r.LastName)
CustomField.label: Party
